    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Martial Artist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6364) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 206 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Martial Artist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=255)

</column>

---

You have trained to use your fists as deadly weapons and can deliver devastatingly powerful blows with them. The damage die for your [fist](/Weapons.aspx?ID=356) unarmed attacks becomes 1d6 instead of 1d4. You don’t take the –2 circumstance penalty for making a lethal attack with your [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=661) unarmed attacks.

<title level="2">Martial Artist Dedication leads to...</title>
[Adamantine Body](/Feats.aspx?ID=7116), [Echoing Violence](/Feats.aspx?ID=7117), [Follow-up Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=6365), [Grievous Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=6366), [Path of Iron](/Feats.aspx?ID=6367)
name: Martial Artist Dedication
